entries.title: Chrome delays plan to limit ad blockers, new timeline coming in March
entries.description: Manifest V3 transition is delayed again to the relief of Chrome users everywhere.

entries.title: China bans AI-generated media without watermarks
entries.description: China regulates generative AI tech with rules that aim to spur growth and ban deception.

entries.title: DOJ divided over charging Binance for alleged crypto crimes, report says
entries.description: Illicit funds processed by Binance in 2022 allegedly amounted to $10 billion.

entries.title: Xiaomi’s new phone takes a ton of inspiration from Apple, as usual
entries.description: Xiaomi's 2023 flagship falls back into old habits.

entries.title: The Moon landing was faked, and wind farms are bad
entries.description: In Germany, opposition to wind farms correlated with conspiratorial thinking.

entries.title: Leaked email shows Musk threatened to sue Twitter employees who leak to media
entries.description: Musk email complains of "many detailed leaks of confidential Twitter information."

entries.title: NASA official “very confident” Artemis spacesuits will be ready on time
entries.description: "They have invested a lot of their own money into the suits."

entries.title: Ubisoft won’t bring its Assassin’s Creed Valhalla achievements to Steam
entries.description: Since-deleted forum post suggested "no current plans" to bring them over.

entries.title: Support for Windows 7 and 8 fully ends in January, including Microsoft Edge
entries.description: Even businesses that will pay for it won't get new Windows 7 security updates.

entries.title: GM and LG get $2.5 billion battery loan from the Department of Energy
entries.description: 11,000 new jobs will be created in Michigan, Ohio, and Tennessee.

entries.title: Raspberry Pi inventory improving, could reach pre-pandemic levels in 2023
entries.description: "Hundreds of thousands" of Pi Zero, 3A+, and 4 models should show up next year.

entries.title: Fusion energy breakthrough by US scientists boosts clean power hopes
entries.description: First-ever net energy gain from fusion raises hopes for zero-carbon alternative.

entries.title: Radeon 7900 XTX and XT review: Faster, hotter, and cheaper than the RTX 4080
entries.description: New $899 and $999 GPUs maintain the status quo in the Nvidia-AMD rivalry.

entries.title: The 2023 Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV is a much-improved hybrid SUV
entries.description: 26 mpg once the battery is depleted is not amazing, however.
